operator-email-template.subject: URGENT-PLEASE READ AND RESPOND:  - SCS Legacy Application Policy Report - Operator
operator-email-template.body:
You are receiving this email because the following Application(s) running in the Pre-Prod and Prod Foundation(s) within your org and space are using p-config-server service. These applications are blocking Cloud Foundry (CF) platform upgrades and are subjecting The Boeing Company to significant risk.

ORG/APP NAME: (please see attachment)

  • How to change the p-spring-server: https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/devguide/deploy-apps/stacks.html
  • How to change the p-spring-server with an automation script: https://git.web.boeing.com/digitalfactory/misc-scripts

Do you still have questions? Contact the Cloud Foundry Team via email at

pcfgrp@exchange.boeing.com
